
snap(30,30,30)

sky(10000,10000,10000)
fog(10000,10000,10000)
ground(10000,10000,10000)

fadefrom(8500)

name(The Freeway)

nlaps(5)

set(11,0,0,0)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5000,0)p
set(10,0,10000,0)p
set(10,0,15000,0)p
